data.name: Ikkarus and the Prince of Sin
data.detailed_description:
CHECK OUT OTHER GAMES

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1820480/Pact_of_the_Ancients__3D_Bara_Action_RPG
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1829850/Crystal_Tales_Tactics_Echoes_of_the_Libertas_War
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1599700/Magic_Exposure__Yuri_Visual_Novel/


About the Game

Ikkarus received from his father a very powerful magical item, the Sun Staff. With that weapon, he was practically invincible in battle - or so he thought, until he met an opponent who defeated him for the first time. So, a competition started between them to know who had the strongest weapon.

As he goes deeper into this journey, he discovers many things he had never imagined. An archer friend who is always rescuing him from the bottom, an equally huge orc rival, and of course - the Prince of Sin himself, who may be so much more than he looks. With them, Ikkarus will end up having many new experiences.

Will he be able to overcome this challenge? Will his bonds of friendship help him with that? Or will his pride lead him down to a path of sin with no return?

Features:


  • Classic J-RPG Gameplay:
  • Guys you can meet and romance;
  • Unique Mini-games;
  • Difficulty Selection;
  • Extra items for Easy Mode;
  • Side Quests;
  • Average playtime: 6 hours or more

data.short_description: Play as Ikkarus, a legendary warrior in a journey for reputation, in this JRPG game about battling big guys and creating bonds of friendship and love with them later.
data.supported_languages: English, Japanese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Spanish - Latin America

Minimum:
  • OS: WindowsÂ® 7/8/8.1/10
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL 4.1 Capable GPU
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
